thread.title: Broadcasting Internship - Pro Sports

title: Broadcasting Internship - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Broadcasting Internship Posted/Updated: 10-24-2015 Brief Job Description: You will write press releases,participate in our radio broadcasts of every game as a color-commentator and play-by-play announcer, and operate StatCrew during games.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
